title: Why target-date funds are the best retirement investment
text:
Why target-date funds are the best retirement investment More

Here’s what’s really amazing: If you invest in a target-date retirement fund, you’ll be taking most of these steps automatically, without any effort. Warren Buffett said: “You only have to do a very few things right in your life as long as you don’t do too many things wrong.” In my view, a target-date fund is amply qualified to be among the “few things right” in the life of an investor. Let me tell you nine reasons investors should learn to love these boring funds.
